basics.name: Kevin Cho
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the Department of Electrical Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2018.

work.summary: Full stack developer for Amazon Spark
highlights:
In charge of an implementation and scaling of the end-to-end Amazon Spark publishing experience using React
Native/Flux and Java/Spring which is used in >80% of all published posts
Designed backend to support two different API integrations
Refactored existing code for increased readability and reusability
Built unit and integration tests for 100% code coverage using JUnit, Jest, JaCoCo, and Istanbul
Practiced Agile development and presented design documentation which covered the full product lifecycle

work.summary: Teaching assistant for object-oriented programming and digital logic design
highlights: Instruct on C++ and object oriented programming paradigm through labs and homework to 26 students weekly
Design bash scripts to automate testing of lab assignments
Lead 25 students in FPGA and basic digital circuit design through weekly labs

work.summary: RF/Software engineering in charge of testing and automation
highlights: Developed MATLAB GUI which streamlined amplifier loadpull and speed up postprocessing by 15%
Utilized Red Hat Enterprise Linux server for CAD simulation and scripting
Simulated calibration structures using ADS and Sonnet 2D EM software packages
Tested GaN, GaAs, and InP transistors for power and gain

volunteer.summary: Developer for data visualization and backend technologies
highlights: Implemented plot generation through the plot.ly Python API for collected sensor data
Pioneered unit and integration testing through pytest, coverage, and nose which led to 100% code coverage
Android plugin developer for an Internet of Things (IoT) smart gateway framework for IoT interaction

Implemented plugin with Google Nearby API for proximity-based web content loading for easy access, secure IoT
endpoints
President, IEEE-HKN Delta Omega Chapter, 2017-Present
Webmaster, IEEE Student Branch, 2017-Present
Member, IEEE Student Branch, 2014-Present
Student Advisory Board Chair, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2015-2016

awards.title: Chancellor's Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded $10000/yr to the top 5% of freshman enrollment at UH Manoa
